Waterloo Region - Public Health and Emergency Services

Health agency that addresses public health issues and promotes healthy living <ul><li> immunization and screening for communicable diseases</li><li> health education programs</li><li> family and child health</li><li> dental health</li><li> sexual health</li><li> injury prevention</li><li> environmental health</li><li> physical activity</li><li> public health standards enforcement</li><li> research and population-based health research</li></ul><BR><BR><B>Services and Programs:</B><UL><LI>Cambridge Office</LI><LI>Child and Family Health</LI><LI>Dental Health Program</LI><LI>Harm Reduction and Needle Syringe Program</LI><LI>Health Protection and Investigation</LI><LI>Immunization Clinic</LI><LI>Infectious Diseases</LI><LI>Paramedic Services</LI><LI>Peer Program</LI><LI>Sexual Health Program</LI><LI>Tuberculosis Skin Test Clinic</LI><LI>Young Adults and Smoking Cessation</LI></UL>
